title: Docusaurus 2.3
authors: [slorber]

date: 2023-01-27
---

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: We are happy to announce **Docusaurus 2.3**.

translations.zh-CN: 我们很高兴地宣布**Docusaurus 2.3**正式发布。

segments.source_content: The upgrade should be easy: as explained in our [release process documentation](/community/release-process), minor versions respect [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/).

translations.zh-CN: 升级过程应该很简单：正如我们的[发布流程文档](/community/release-process)所述，次要版本遵循[语义化版本控制](https://semver.org/)规范。

segments.source_content: ![Docusaurus 2.2 social card](./img/social-card.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![Docusaurus 2.2 社交媒体卡片](./img/social-card.png)

segments.source_content: <!--truncate-->

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_28a64196

segments.source_content: ## Highlights

translations.zh-CN: ## 重点更新

segments.source_content: ### Google Tag Manager plugin

translations.zh-CN: ### Google Tag Manager插件

segments.source_content: Google Tag Manager is a tag management system that allows great flexibility. It enables analytics and marketing teams to easily load other third-party trackers and fire analytics tags.

translations.zh-CN: Google Tag Manager是一个提供高度灵活性的标签管理系统，它使分析和营销团队能够轻松加载其他第三方追踪器并触发分析标签。

segments.source_content: We now have a [`@docusaurus/plugin-google-tag-manager`](/docs/api/plugins/@docusaurus/plugin-google-tag-manager/) package that you can use alongside or as an alternative to the existing [gtag.js plugin](/docs/api/plugins/@docusaurus/plugin-google-gtag/) (refer to [this doc](https://support.google.com/tagmanager/answer/7582054) to understand when to use which solution).

translations.zh-CN: 我们现在提供了[`@docusaurus/plugin-google-tag-manager`](/docs/api/plugins/@docusaurus/plugin-google-tag-manager/)包，您可以将其与现有的[gtag.js插件](/docs/api/plugins/@docusaurus/plugin-google-gtag/)一起使用或作为替代方案（请参阅[此文档](https://support.google.com/tagmanager/answer/7582054)了解何时使用哪种解决方案）。

segments.source_content:
:::warning[Google is sunsetting Universal Analytics]

[Google will sunset its Universal Analytics](https://blog.google/products/marketingplatform/analytics/prepare-for-future-with-google-analytics-4/) on **July 1, 2023**, and ask users to migrate to **Google Analytics 4**.

Therefore, we are also **deprecating our existing [`@docusaurus/plugin-google-analytics`](/docs/api/plugins/@docusaurus/plugin-google-analytics)** package. Docusaurus users should create a new Google Analytics 4 property, and migrate to the [gtag.js plugin](/docs/api/plugins/@docusaurus/plugin-google-gtag/), or the [Google Tag Manager plugin](/docs/api/plugins/@docusaurus/plugin-google-tag-manager/). Refer to the [dedicated Docusaurus issue](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/7221) for details and questions.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::warning[Google即将停止支持Universal Analytics]

[Google将于2023年7月1日停止其Universal Analytics服务](https://blog.google/products/marketingplatform/analytics/prepare-for-future-with-google-analytics-4/)，并要求用户迁移至**Google Analytics 4**。

因此，我们也将**弃用现有的[`@docusaurus/plugin-google-analytics`](/docs/api/plugins/@docusaurus/plugin-google-analytics)**包。Docusaurus用户应创建新的Google Analytics 4属性，并迁移至[gtag.js插件](/docs/api/plugins/@docusaurus/plugin-google-gtag/)或[Google Tag Manager插件](/docs/api/plugins/@docusaurus/plugin-google-tag-manager/)。详情和问题请参阅[专门的Docusaurus议题](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/7221)。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Tabs Query String Support

translations.zh-CN: ### 标签页查询字符串支持

segments.source_content: It is now possible to link a selected tab to a query string parameter. When a tab is selected, it will be stored in your browser URL as a `?qs-param=tab-value` search parameter.

translations.zh-CN: 现在可以将选定的标签页与查询字符串参数关联。当选择标签页时，它会以`?qs-param=tab-value`搜索参数的形式存储在浏览器URL中。

segments.source_content: This feature allows deep-linking to a specific documentation tab that will pre-selected on page load.

translations.zh-CN: 此功能允许深度链接到特定的文档标签页，该标签页将在页面加载时预选。

segments.source_content: When used alongside the `groupId` prop, the query string tab value takes precedence over the `localStorage` value.

translations.zh-CN: 当与`groupId`属性一起使用时，查询字符串标签值优先于`localStorage`值。

segments.source_content: Make sure to check the [documentation](/docs/markdown-features/tabs#query-string) and the demo below to understand how it works:

translations.zh-CN: 请务必查看[文档](/docs/markdown-features/tabs#query-string)和下面的演示以了解其工作原理：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_fbb28999

segments.source_content:
```tsx
<Tabs groupId="current-os" queryString>
  <TabItem value="android" label="Android">
    Android
  </TabItem>
  <TabItem value="ios" label="iOS">
    iOS
  </TabItem>
</Tabs>
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_b75ddc12

segments.source_content:
<BrowserWindow>
  <Tabs groupId="current-os" queryString>
    <TabItem value="android" label="Android">
      Android
    </TabItem>
    <TabItem value="ios" label="iOS">
      iOS
    </TabItem>
  </Tabs>
</BrowserWindow>

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_6214d3c2

segments.source_content: ### Nested admonitions

translations.zh-CN: ### 嵌套警示框

segments.source_content: It is now possible to nest one admonition within another by adding extra colons for the outer/enclosing admonition:

translations.zh-CN: 现在可以通过为外部/包围的警示框添加额外的冒号来实现嵌套警示框：

segments.source_content:
```md
::::tip[nested admonitions]

You can now nest one admonition within another!

:::danger

Use this sparingly when it makes sense.

:::

::::
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_bc137a19

segments.source_content:
::::tip[nested admonitions]

You can now nest one admonition within another!

:::danger

Use this sparingly when it makes sense.

:::

::::

translations.zh-CN:
::::tip[嵌套警示框]

您现在可以在一个警示框中嵌套另一个警示框！

:::danger

请谨慎使用此功能，仅在确实需要时使用。

:::

::::

segments.source_content: ### Blog `createFeedItems`

translations.zh-CN: ### 博客`createFeedItems`功能

segments.source_content: A new blog plugin option [`feedOptions.createFeedItems`](/docs/api/plugins/@docusaurus/plugin-content-blog/#CreateFeedItemsFn) gives you more control over the RSS/Atom feed generation. It is now possible to transform/filter/limit feed items through a new callback.

translations.zh-CN: 新的博客插件选项[`feedOptions.createFeedItems`](/docs/api/plugins/@docusaurus/plugin-content-blog/#CreateFeedItemsFn)为您提供了对RSS/Atom源生成的更多控制。现在可以通过新的回调函数来转换/过滤/限制源项目。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_cae897fb

segments.source_content: ### Translations

translations.zh-CN: ### 翻译支持

segments.source_content: We added or completed the default theme translation support for multiple languages:

translations.zh-CN: 我们为多种语言添加或完善了默认主题的翻译支持：

segments.source_content:
- 🇸🇮 [#8541](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8541) Slovenian
- 🇹🇷 [#8289](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8289) Turkish
- 🇮🇷 [#8406](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8406) Farsi
- 🇵🇱 [#8525](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8525) Polish
- 🇨🇳 [#8423](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8423) Chinese
- 🇸🇪 [#8312](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8312) Swedish
- 🇻🇳 [#8450](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8450) Vietnamese

translations.zh-CN:
- 🇸🇮 [#8541](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8541) 斯洛文尼亚语
- 🇹🇷 [#8289](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8289) 土耳其语
- 🇮🇷 [#8406](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8406) 波斯语
- 🇵🇱 [#8525](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8525) 波兰语
- 🇨🇳 [#8423](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8423) 中文
- 🇸🇪 [#8312](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8312) 瑞典语
- 🇻🇳 [#8450](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8450) 越南语

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Completing theme translations is an [ongoing effort](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/3526) and an easy way to contribute to Docusaurus. We add new theme features regularly, for which we often [need new translations](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/3526).

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip

完善主题翻译是一项[持续进行的工作](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/3526)，也是为Docusaurus做贡献的简单方式。我们会定期新增主题功能，通常[需要新的翻译](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/3526)。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Other changes

translations.zh-CN: ## 其他变更

segments.source_content: Other notable changes include:

translations.zh-CN: 其他值得注意的变更包括：

segments.source_content:
- [#8463](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8463) and [#8328](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8328): fix some annoying Docusaurus layout issues
- [#8539](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8539): Algolia plugin `options.searchPagePath` should be correctly applied to search modal footer
- [#8462](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8462): Algolia plugin now makes it easier to transform displayed search results with custom logic
- [#8397](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8397): the `deploy` CLI now understands git url `insteadOf` config

translations.zh-CN:
- [#8463](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8463) 和 [#8328](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8328)：修复了一些烦人的Docusaurus布局问题
- [#8539](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8539)：Algolia插件的`options.searchPagePath`现在能正确应用到搜索模态框的页脚
- [#8462](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8462)：Algolia插件现在更容易通过自定义逻辑转换显示的搜索结果
- [#8397](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8397)：`deploy` CLI现在能识别git url的`insteadOf`配置

segments.source_content: Check the **[2.3.0 changelog entry](/changelog/2.3.0)** for an exhaustive list of changes.

translations.zh-CN: 查看完整的变更列表请参阅**[2.3.0版本更新日志](/changelog/2.3.0)**。
